oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: First Christian Church congregation
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Group photograph of the First Christian Church congregation gathered outside of the church building in Crab Orchard, Tennessee. The church was founded in 1905, and the first minister was Brother J.G. Wilson. On August 13, 1937, lightning destroyed the church building, but services continued uninterrupted at Crab Orchard Elementary School until a new building was completed in 1938.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Churches; People
